description: A deadly knuckle made of advanced material now resides inside your forearm, capable of being extended through the back of your hand at the cost of a small amount of power.  Though exceptionally sturdy, it will prevent you from holding anything else while extended.

A sturdy knuckle made of advanced material that is installed inside the forearm, capable of being extended through the back of user's hand at the cost of a small amount of power.  Though exceptionally sturdy, it will prevent the user from holding anything else while extended.
A super sturdy knuckle made from high-tech superalloy. As a bionic weapon, this is integrated to you.

A deadly mantis blade made of advanced material now resides inside your forearm, capable of being extended through the back of your hand at the cost of a small amount of power.  Though exceptionally sturdy, it will prevent you from holding anything else while extended.

A sturdy mantis blade made of advanced material that is installed inside the forearm, capable of being extended through the back of user's hand at the cost of a small amount of power.  Though exceptionally sturdy, it will prevent the user from holding anything else while extended.
A super sturdy and long mantis blades made from high-tech superalloy. As a bionic weapon, this is integrated to you. Not quite damaging but have a long range.

The flesh on your arms and hands have been surgically replaced by alloy plating.  Provides 12 bash and cut protection, 10 ballistic protection, and can be used in conjunction with bionic martial arts.

Your eye sockets have been surgically sealed with highly protective mirrored lenses and your tear ducts have been re-routed to your mouth.  Provides 3 bash and cut protection, and 7 environmental protection.
The flesh on your head has been surgically replaced by alloy plating, protecting both your head and jaw regions.  Provides 12 bash and cut protection, and 10 ballistic protection.
The flesh on your legs and feet have been surgically replaced by alloy plating.  Provides 12 bash and cut protection, 10 ballistic protection, and can be used in conjunction with bionic martial arts.
The flesh on your torso has been surgically replaced by alloy plating, protecting it from physical trauma.  Provides 12 bash and cut protection, and 10 ballistic protection.

The better version of the original alloy plating that replaces the flesh on the user's arms.  Provides 12 bash and cut protection, 10 ballistic protection, and can be used in conjunction with bionic martial arts.

A bionic package that seals the user's eye sockets with highly protective mirrored lenses and re-routes their tear ducts to their mouth.  Provides 3 bash and cut protection, and 7 environmental protection.

The better version of the original alloy plating that replaces the flesh on the user's head, protecting both their head and jaw regions.  Provides 12 bash and cut protection, and 10 ballistic protection.

The better version of the original alloy plating that replaces the flesh on the user's legs.  Provides 12 bash and cut protection, 10 ballistic protection, and can be used in conjunction with bionic martial arts.
The better version of the original alloy plating that replaces the flesh on the user's torso, protecting it from physical trauma.  Provides 12 bash and cut protection, and 12 ballistic protection.
